entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:42 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
